# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object that receives the completion results.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any MKLocalSearchCompleterDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You must provide a delegate object to receive completion results and to handle any errors that might occur. For more information about the methods of the delegate protocol, see [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKLocalSearchCompleterDelegate].

## Receiving the search results

- **MKLocalSearchCompleterDelegate**: Methods the delegate calls with search completion data.

items.description: Methods the delegate calls with search completion data.
